conversion_verification.notes: Successful 3D transformation with clear depth and cutaway perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Solid 3D representation. Minimal docking for slightly flat lighting in some corners.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High layout fidelity. Wall placement and room adjacencies are highly accurate to the source 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Excellent furniture matching, including specific dining chair counts and kitchen island placement.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean render; geometry is readable. Background is neutral and non-distracting.

detected_errors.description: Minor window styling differences compared to floor plan notation.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains strict geometric alignment and detailed furniture placement relative to the original floor plan.
